articles.description: Max Verstappen tells BBC Sport in Las Vegas about the approach that has brought him to the cusp of a fourth world title.
articles.title: Max Verstappen: Red Bull driver on racing to 'the limit'

articles.description: Tottenham head coach Ange Postecoglou says Rodrigo Bentancur is an "outstanding person" that made a "mistake" with his racial slur against team-mate Son Heung-min.
articles.title: Rodrigo Bentancur ban: Ange Postecoglou backs Tottenham against severity of midfielder's ban

articles.description: From rejection at Benfica to new Manchester United head coach, BBC Sport charts the rise of Ruben Amorim.
articles.title: The story of Ruben Amorim: Man Utd's new manager branded the 'second Special One'

articles.description: Two-time Olympic champion Alistair Brownlee announces his retirement from the sport at the age of 36.
articles.title: Alistair Brownlee: Double Olympic champion retires aged 36

articles.description: Ulster back row Cormac Izuchukwu and Leinster hooker Gus McCarthy are handed their Ireland debuts with Sam Prendergast given a first start at fly-half for Saturday's game against Fiji.
articles.title: Ireland vs Fiji: Cormac Izuchukwu & Gus McCarthy handed debuts as Sam Prendergast starts at 10

articles.description: Refereeing body PGMOL says Premier League official David Coote's ongoing "welfare" is "important to us" as its investigation into his conduct continues.
articles.title: David Coote: Premier League referee's 'welfare' is 'important' to PGMOL during investigation

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says he will "give it absolutely everything" for his final three races with Mercedes after struggling badly in the Sao Paulo Grand Prix.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton says 'nothing can take me down' after Sao Paulo GP low

articles.description: Chelsea captain Reece James suffers another hamstring injury and will be unavailable to face Leicester on Saturday.
articles.title: Reece James: Chelsea captain has suffered another hamstring injury says Enzo Maresca

articles.description: With access to England's performance centre at Loughborough, BBC Sport looks at the future of coaching, selection and... soil.
articles.title: Andrew Flintoff, Elvis and Loughborough pitches - life in England's fast lane

articles.description: Australia await reigning champions Italy or Argentina in the Davis Cup semi-finals after defeating the USA in a doubles decider.
articles.title: Davis Cup: Australia to play Italy or Argentina in semi-finals after beating USA
